item.description:
I'd like to extend a special invitation to anyone who hasn't made it to a book meeting, but all are welcome. I'm hoping to meet more of our members and hopefully see the 7:00 showing of The Simpsons Movie, Regal theater at the Landmark Center (near the Fenway stop on the D line). Afterwards we can head over to the Cold Stone Creamery next door.
Online tickets for the theater are available at Fandango.com. As we all know, this movie just came out, so get your tickets before they're gone.
We might not be able to sit together, but no worries. If one of us gets separated, we're all adults. I'm going to make you all wear the same colored T-shirts and hold hands in a "buddy system"......or will I? (stroking chin thoughtfully)
Hope to see you there!
item.name: Movie plus Ice cream night
